title: You know Garen would the perfect main character for a league of legends movie
body:
If Riot wanted to release a box office failure

http://i.imgur.com/3HnJg43.gif

replies.body:
Unlike Noxian scum, a Demacian knows you don't have to make money to be good. Let's not forget that "It's a wonderful life", "The Shawshank Redemption", "Fight Club", and "Willy Wonka and the chocolate factory" all failed in the box office.

http://49.media.tumblr.com/aec787e9381945ae72c4546afc64f22c/tumblr_nl225qMjF41qejpvyo1_500.gif

I don't think you need medicine for your burn. JUST ICE.
Oh please any movie with Garen as the main character would be worst then M night shyamalan Avatar movie. A main character needs to be more then a one dimensional poorly written idiot

You seem tense. It will be ok. The Light of Demacia shines even on you.
http://orig11.deviantart.net/d0b8/f/2014/315/3/8/giphy_by_baymaxbig_hero_6-d863gzq.gif

btw, today's All chat is right up your alley.

What a meme war looks like from the outside 
https://media2.giphy.com/media/K5SbKyT5ac0eY/200.gif

http://orig14.deviantart.net/f865/f/2013/321/d/c/commission__varus_and_ezreal_by_irahi-d6umqem.jpg

I'd like to see a LoL movie about this. 

*Prepares to be attacked by shippers everywhere*

And riven would be so much better.







No Really, Riven would be much better




I don't like Garen

I had always figured that if League had a movie, the MC would be Ezreal. His generic appearance seems like something out of an rpg game, and would stumble across a destiny somehow once he discovers his gauntlet thingy and be thrown into a world with evil spooky ghosts and deadly samurais with just that.
A Leauge movie should be about a real hero {{champion:201}} who knows what is worth fighting for.
i would like to see it focus on one character from each nation, then all come together as a team to fight like the void..or something..

Garen's a pretty cool guy, but choosing him as the main character of a LoL movie would be too cliche.

Using Riven would be too angsty.

What we need is someone unorthodox, something awesome...

Something... metal.

...

{{champion:112}} 

Perfect!

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=9T9NP3tZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-09T22:54:59.536+0000)
>
> I'm not sure I understand. :/

there is going to be a movie of WoW which nobody has high expectations for... I'm sure you can fill the blanks from there
Not WoW, just warcraft, there is a difference.

Nah, this is just another fued between Laughing Fish and RaptorKarr

silly really

https://media3.giphy.com/media/11hT8xo3mrYacw/200.gif
He sure knows how to pick a bad fight.  That fish knows how to wield JUSTICE better than any other.
It also doesn't help that Garen would just be shouting "DEMACIA!!!" constantly.

Well i'll enjoy a Riven getting owned again.
